p.k: Claudio Iturra and his team embark on a journey through the forests of Tanzania in search of one of the last wild tribes that inhabit the world: Hadzas. To do this, first perform the formalities at customs in order to have permission to travel around the country recording its stunning scenery and culture. In the course of the Hadzas looking for uncertain roads and only some hints of where to locate them, they come across a small village where some ask for directions to Lake Eyazi, where supposedly inhabit the Hadzas. There, along with sharing a moment with the locals, they know Jushub a villager who will accompany as a tour guide during their journey.
